Original:
打卡這間在五星級飯店內的寶藏WINE BAR！由冠軍侍酒師精選的酒單，讓今晚擁有了既專業、獨特又難忘的體驗。

Friday night放鬆心情與壓力的最好方式，就是到wine bar小酌，搜尋到大直內湖這邊的人氣酒吧-Park90，二話不說直接衝。

位於五星級美福大飯店裡4樓，裝修肯定要同於五星級大飯店的水平，走進店裡，暗色系的低調奢華，高雅的品味設計，柔和的燈光、沙發與舒服的爵士樂，馬上就讓人放鬆心情，進入雙休日的愉快心情。

酒吧低消就是只要一人點一杯酒，非常親民實惠，翻開厚厚的一本酒單，從新世界到舊世界都有，熱門國家產區法國、義大利、澳洲、新西蘭全都包括。據說酒單是由世界知名評論家與榮獲國際大獎的專業侍酒師精心挑選，一翻開酒單就覺得專業，整本酒單最吸引的是wine by the glass的部分，因為我們兩個人，一般只能開2瓶，看到開單杯，可以滿足一個晚上喝很多不同的款式、喝不同的葡萄酒，就讓人興奮，而且wine by the glass 的酒單頁數就有3頁，選擇非常多樣，讓人非常興奮，店內的侍酒師Kevin很專業也很熱情地為我們介紹了很多特色酒款，每一款都有著獨特的香氣及口感，讓我們今晚的wine bar體驗，專業、獨特又非常難忘。

總體來說，這家葡萄酒吧非常值得一去。無論是與朋友聚會還是獨自品味葡萄酒，這裡都是一個不錯的選擇。推薦大家一定要親自去體驗一番，相信你一定會被它的魅力所吸引。
EN:
Pickup this treasure in a five -star restaurant Wine Bar!The wine list selected by the champion sommelier allows tonight to have a professional, unique and unforgettable experience.

The best way to relax from FRIDAY NIGHT is to drink at Wine Bar and find the popular bar on Dazhi Neihu Lake-PARK90.

Located on the 4th floor of the five -star Meifu Hotel, the decoration must be the same as the level of a five -star hotel. When you enter the store, the dark -colored low -key luxury, elegant taste design, soft lights, sofas and comfortable jazz music , Immediately make people relax and enter the happy mood.

The low bar of the bar is as long as one person order a glass of wine, which is very affordable and affordable. It opens a thick wine list. From the new world to the old world, the popular national production areas France, Italy, Australia, and New Zealand are all included.It is said that the wine list is carefully selected by the world -renowned critics and professional sommeliers who won the International Award. As soon as you open the wine list, you feel that the whole wine list is the part of the Wine by the Glass, because the two of us, Generally you can only open 2 bottles. When you see a single cup, you can satisfy drinking a lot of different styles and drinking different wines in one night. Diverse and very exciting. The sommelier in the store KEVIN is very professional and enthusiastic about we have introduced a lot of specialty wines. Each one has a unique aroma and taste. Let us have a Wine Bar experience tonight. Unique and unforgettable.

Overall, this bar is very worthwhile.Whether it is a party with friends or taste wine alone, this is a good choice.It is recommended that everyone must experience it in person, I believe you will be attracted by its charm.

Original:
很幸運的在IG上被推薦到這個酒吧/他們的爵士樂分享活動。雖然只是他們第二次舉辦音樂活動，但由於爵士女伶-小山郁美的表現極佳、keyboard也有非常華麗的演出，搭配起來甚至有第一種化學反應在其中，這次表演非常成功。讓整個精緻的空間更添色彩。

當然 好音樂也少不了好酒，很意外的紅白酒的單杯選擇相當豐富，侍酒師4號（諧音）表示他們會放上來的單杯一定都是各具特色、相當有趣的單品。雖然自己對紅白酒確實不懂，但在侍酒師的介紹之下，每一個項目感覺都活了起來，最後也很順利的選到了四杯風格迥異、各具特色的紅酒🍷，搭配著女伶美聲，真是美好的夜晚。

Fortunately, I was recommended to this bar/their jazz sharing activities on IG.Although they only held music activities for the second time, because of the excellent performance of Jazz-Koyama Yumei, Keyboard also had very gorgeous performances. It even had the first chemical response to it. This performance was very successful.Add color to the entire exquisite space.

Of course, good music is also indispensable. The surprising single cup of red and white wine is quite rich. The sommelier No. 4 (homophonic) indicates that the single cups they will put in must have their own characteristics and quite interesting items.Although I do n’t understand red and white wine, under the introduction of the sommelier, each project feels alive, and finally chooses four cups of red wine with different styles and unique characteristics. Meisheng is really a wonderful night.

Park90源自新加坡。  這家酒吧/酒廊受到我們新加坡朋友的強烈推薦。  我們沒有失望，酒品選擇豐富，價格合理。  我們喝了一瓶非常棒的 2012 年 Antifori Tignanello 葡萄酒。

我們沒有嘗試酒吧食物，但看起來不錯。  下次我們會早點回來並嘗試這裡的食物。

這是一個新的隱藏寶石！
EN:
Park90 originated from Singapore.This bar/lounge has been strongly recommended by our friends in Singapore.We are not disappointed, the wine choices are rich and the price is reasonable.We drank a bottle of Antifori Tignanello wine in 2012.

We didn't try to eat food, but it looked good.Next time we will come back early and try the food here.

This is a new hidden gem!
